Name: DRILLMAN 6378137
About the game: The game involves aiming at the goal while avoiding obstacles. DRILLMAN continues to dig for ground again today. 3 game modes Standard A mode in which players aim for the goal while avoiding obstacles. Endless A mode in which the user digs to any extent while avoiding obstacles. TimeAttack A mode to measure the time to the goal.
